'''Kanotix''', also referred to as '''KANOTIX''', is a [[Linux distribution]] [[LiveCD]] ([[LiveDistro]]) based on [[Debian]] (until 2006 ''unstable'', in 2007 KANOTIX moved to Debian Etch) with advanced hardware detection.<ref> [http://www.kanotix.org/index.html Kanotix Introduction] </ref> <ref> [http://www.tuxmachines.org/node/19794 Thorhammer Beta-Review on tuxmachines.org, July 2007 (author: eco2geek)]</ref> It can run from an [[optical disc drive]] without using a [[hard disk]].
+
'''Kanotix''', also referred to as '''KANOTIX''', is a [[Linux distribution]] [[Live CD]] ([[LiveDistro]]) based on [[Debian]] (until 2006 ''unstable'', in 2007 KANOTIX moved to Debian Etch) with advanced hardware detection.<ref> [http://www.kanotix.org/index.html Kanotix Introduction] </ref> <ref> [http://www.tuxmachines.org/node/19794 Thorhammer Beta-Review on tuxmachines.org, July 2007 (author: eco2geek)]</ref> It can run from an [[optical disc drive]] without using a [[hard disk]].
Kanotix uses [[KDE]] as the default [[desktop environment]]. [[GNOME]] and other [[window manager]]s can be downloaded using [[Advanced Packaging Tool|APT]].
Kanotix uses [[KDE]] as the default [[desktop environment]]. [[GNOME]] and other [[window manager]]s can be downloaded using [[Advanced Packaging Tool|APT]].
